comments.body: There are 3 names here that the developer has to pick: file name, class name, and `benchmarkName`. It would be nice to explain what purpose each name serves.

I'd like to keep this document in the "how to" style so one can just follow the steps. It's ok if some explanation are missing, as long as they are not blocking adding a new benchmarks, or running/debugging an existing one.
However, it's fair game to add as much explanation as possible in the dartdocs for classes in question. As you are refactoring these classes right now perhaps you can also add more docs? :)

[This change](https://github.com/flutter/flutter/commit/7bef51acc979ee467c02a7503a8990a6edbb0ae3) removed the this README text, so with your merge conflict you need to also remove it.
